meanings.definition: In a way that causes fear or alarm.
meanings.sent1: The thunderstorm outside was frighteningly loud.
meanings.sent2: She ran frighteningly fast to escape the dark forest.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy barked frighteningly at its own reflection.
meanings.sent4: The old house creaked frighteningly in the dead of night.
meanings.sent5: The ghost story was told so frighteningly that everyone jumped.

meanings.definition: To an extreme or alarming degree.
meanings.sent1: The price of the rare painting skyrocketed frighteningly.
meanings.sent2: He worked frighteningly hard to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The chef added salt frighteningly to the soup by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The car sped frighteningly down the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The news of the impending storm spread frighteningly throughout the town.
